title: Update regarding LuxeBrands
story_body:
LuxeBrands Corporation (NASDAQ: LUXE) announced a routine organizational update on Tuesday, January 14, 2025, at 09:15 EST.

The company confirmed the appointment of Sarah Chen as Vice President of Regional Marketing for the Asia-Pacific division, effective February 1, 2025. Chen will report to the Chief Marketing Officer and will be based at the company's Singapore office. The position was previously held on an interim basis following a departmental restructuring completed in the fourth quarter of 2024.

LuxeBrands Corporation stated that Chen joined the organization in 2019 and most recently served as Senior Director of Digital Marketing. The company did not provide additional details regarding compensation or specific strategic initiatives associated with the appointment.

In a separate disclosure, LuxeBrands Corporation confirmed participation in the annual Sustainable Retail Forum scheduled for March 12-14, 2025, in Boston, Massachusetts. The company will present updates on its existing environmental compliance programs during a panel session on March 13, 2025. No new environmental commitments or policy changes were announced in connection with this participation.

The company also confirmed the continuation of its employee wellness program for the 2025 fiscal year. The program, which has been in operation since 2022, provides standard health screening services and fitness facility access to full-time employees at corporate locations. LuxeBrands Corporation stated that program parameters remain unchanged from the previous year.

LuxeBrands Corporation did not announce any changes to executive compensation structures, board composition, or strategic business direction in connection with these updates. The company confirmed that these announcements do not affect previously issued financial guidance for fiscal year 2025.

Trading in LuxeBrands Corporation common stock continued without interruption following the announcements. The company did not schedule a conference call or investor presentation related to these updates.

LuxeBrands Corporation operates retail locations across North America, Europe, and Asia-Pacific regions. The company's next scheduled earnings release is projected for April 2025, covering first quarter fiscal year 2025 results.
